title: How to Wrap a Towel Around Your Waist

steps.title: Hold the towel length-ways behind your back with adjacent corners in each hand.
steps.content: Hold the towel length-ways behind your back with adjacent corners in each hand.

steps.title: Wrap the towel around yourself with the right hand side overlapping the left, or vice versa.
steps.content: Wrap the towel around yourself with the right hand side overlapping the left, or vice versa.

steps.title: Use both hands to hold the overlapping corner against the overlapped edge.
steps.content: Use both hands to hold the overlapping corner against the overlapped edge.

steps.title: Roll down the top edge over the corner.
steps.content: Roll down the top edge over the corner.

steps.title: Continue rolling the entire top edge all the way around your waist.
steps.content: Continue rolling the entire top edge all the way around your waist. Voila. It will now stay securely on your waist.
